plot: Yearning to fly, a boy builds a flying machine and takes to the skies. But has his ambition caused him to exceed his bounds?
title: Climb
plot_es: Yearning to fly, a boy builds a flying machine and takes to the skies. But has his ambition caused him to exceed his bounds?
plot_en: Yearning to fly, a boy builds a flying machine and takes to the skies. But has his ambition caused him to exceed his bounds?
